attributes.comment:
As future adoptive parents we are very concerned with proposed changes. We
have already submitted all paperwork required and paid all applicable fees.
However, we are going to be forced to renew this paperwork due to the 18 month
expiration of the paperwork.

We understand that the paperwork should expire, however, we would like to
propose that you have a "renewal" fee, which would be much lower than the initial
fee, for such paperwork. The reason for a lower fee is that the labor for processing
renewed paperwork should be much lower than the initial process. Also, is there
any way to extend the expiration period for fingerprints? One year seems
somewhat restrictive.

Thank you for this opportunity to comment.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Chris Gulley
